name: DeviceActivityMonitor
desc: The object that monitors scheduled device activity.

items.name: init()
items.desc: Creates a new monitor implemented by subclasses.

items.name: func intervalDidEnd(for: DeviceActivityName)
items.desc: Indicates that the device activity interval ended.

items.name: func intervalDidStart(for: DeviceActivityName)
items.desc: Indicates that the device activity interval started.

items.name: func intervalWillEndWarning(for: DeviceActivityName)
items.desc: Warns your app of an ongoing activityâ€™s conclusion a specified time before the activity ends.

items.name: func intervalWillStartWarning(for: DeviceActivityName)
items.desc: Warns your app of an upcoming activity a specified time before the activity starts.

items.name: func eventDidReachThreshold(DeviceActivityEvent.Name, activity: DeviceActivityName)
items.desc: Indicates that the activity reached its threshold.

items.name: func eventWillReachThresholdWarning(DeviceActivityEvent.Name, activity: DeviceActivityName)
items.desc: Warns your app that an activity is about to reach its threshold.
